import React from "react"; import {Col, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; import home from '../data/home.json'; const Gallery = () => { const [home, setHomeData] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(function () { fetch('https://voda-react-assessment.herokuapp.com/home') .then(r =>r.json()) .then(data=> setHomeData(data)) .catch(err => console.error(err)) }, [home.length]); const galleryData = home.length > 0 ? home[0].sections[0] : null; return ( galleryData != null ?
{galleryData.images[0].title}
{galleryData.images[1].title}
{galleryData.images[2].title}
{galleryData.images[3].title}
{galleryData.images[4].title}
 : null ); } export default Gallery;
